=====================

.. py:module:: django.template.utils


Exceptions

   django.template.utils.InvalidTemplateEngineError

.. autoapisummary::

   django.template.utils.EngineHandler

.. autoapisummary::

   django.template.utils.get_app_template_dirs


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:exception:: InvalidTemplateEngineError

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.core.exceptions.ImproperlyConfigured`


   Django is somehow improperly configured


.. py:class:: EngineHandler(templates=None)

   .. py:method:: templates()


   .. py:method:: all()


.. py:function:: get_app_template_dirs(dirname)

   Return an iterable of paths of directories to load app templates from.

   dirname is the name of the subdirectory containing templates inside
   installed applications.
